snippet.title: NEW Sombrero Gameplay on "The Southern Ruins" Stage! 720p/60fps
snippet.description:
It's been a loooong time since I've posted a video update of Sombrero gameplay. I'd been wanting to get the powerups working before posting a new video, and a really annoying bug got in the way - past tense, because it's now solved, and there's powerups in Sombrero!

More updates will be coming more quickly as Sombrero gets closer to release.

*** It seems I only uploaded 720p/60fps footage. I'll make sure the next update is 1080p/60fps. On my development workstation with an EVGA 770 the game runs perfectly smooth at 2560x1440/60fps, so if you've got a decent GPU you should have no issues getting ultra smooth gameplay as well.

Sombrero Website: http://sombrerogame.com
PixelMetal Website: http://pixelmetal.com

PixelMetal on Twitter: http://twitter.com/pixelmetal
PixelMetal on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pixelmetal
